subject: Re: Breakthru College Website
preview: Hi Josh, Great, confirming the old Microsoft Chatbot has been deactivated.

full_threads.body:
Hi Josh, 

Great, confirming the old Microsoft Chatbot has been deactivated.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body: @chris all good now.
Hi @manuel can you please remove the Microsoft chatbot?

Thanks Chris, all good with access. When you have a sec can you just kill the old Microsoft chatbot for me? It's currently interfering with/hiding the tidio chat window. Cheers!

Regards,

Joshua Cook​​​​

+ additional 15mins for new plugin.

Hi Josh, 

All set with the plugin. 

Link: https://stg-breakthrucollege-staging.kinsta.cloud/wp-admin/

Your Breakthru College login credentials should work, please let me know if you need a hand with access.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
@chris done installing the plugin. by the way, before it works you need to create the account first.





Spend time 3mins

hi @manuel, are you able to assist with Josh's request to add the following plugin: https://wordpress.org/plugins/tidio-live-chat/

to website: https://stg-breakthrucollege-staging.kinsta.cloud/

Thanks Chris. If you guys aren't across it Tidio might be the go, as I've used that in the past. Can I get you to install the Tidio Wordpress plugin when ready so I can test and share the staging sites with ops once I've setup the chatbot.

Cheers,

Joshua Cook​​​​

Marketing Manager, Disability Services

T 1800 767 212

|

M 0490 305 252

|

E Joshua.Cook@breakthru.org.au

Level 2, 689 Ann Street Fortitude Valley Queensland 4006

breakthru.org.au





I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.

Hi Josh, 

Most welcome. 

Not personally, and I am not aware of any of our clients using the Microsoft chatbot. I know of clients who use Dynamics but have opted for a 3rd party chat, but I'd only be speculating as the motivation there.

From a quick look at https://www.tidio.com/, it does appear superior to the MS option. When the time comes, we can test the tidio option on the staging site and perhaps that will help you make the call.

Legend thanks Chris. Functionality-wise it looks alright, but we would need to customise the look significantly to go live. If it's anything like other Microsoft products I imagine this will be difficult though. For example:
  • I'd like to have the box float and stretch further up the page, similar to Tidio - Customer Service Software To Grow Your Business | Tidio
  • Would love to change the colours/fonts on the chat bot, and remove that black border
  • The chat bot current only has the option to close the chat entirely. No option to minimise it seems
I found some documentation here: Customize the Web Chat canvas - Microsoft Copilot Studio | Microsoft Learn Is this something you've worked with before, or are you able to give an estimate of effort to get some of those things touched up? If it's going to be too time consuming I may just forgo the native CRM integration piece and instead pay for an out of the box tool like Tidio. Regards, Joshua Cook​​​​ Marketing Manager, Disability Services T 1800 767 212 | M 0490 305 252 | E Joshua.Cook@breakthru.org.au Level 2, 689 Ann Street Fortitude Valley Queensland 4006 breakthru.org.au I wish to pay my respects to the traditional custodians and all Aboriginal community elders and people, past and present on whose lands I live and work.
+1hour added to harvest and closed.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body:
@chris 

Time spend 1hr
@manuel please let me know time used on this ticket.

Hi Josh, 

Great news, the staging server is ready. You can see it here: https://stg-breakthrucollege-staging.kinsta.cloud/

The co-pilot chatbot has been added. Please note, full functionality is not present but I believe this should allow you to assess the look and feel. 

Please let me know if you need anything else.

@chris 
Please check if ok now.

https://stg-breakthrucollege-staging.kinsta.cloud/

Hi Josh, 

I have asked the dev team to set up a staging server. We can test the chatbot there to not disrupt the user journey on the live site. 

We should have it up and running tomorrow, I'll loop back the moment it is ready to go.

@manuel are you able to create a staging/test server for: https://www.breakthrucollege.edu.au/ ?

Once complete, we need to add the test chatbot.
